name: Evanora, the medicine woman
text: Ah, welcome to our humble little village on the island of Telmaron! I'm Evanora, the medicine woman. If you ever find yourself in need of a remedy or simply some kind words, do come by. The plants around here are quite magical, you know. Is there anything I can help you with today?

name: Evanora, the medicine woman
text: Hello again, traveler! Welcome once more to our charming village. I'm Evanora, ready to tend to any ailments or offer guidance. Please, feel free to share what brings you here or if there's any way I can be of assistance. The island has many wonders, and I'm sure you'll find your place among them.

name: Evanora, the medicine woman
text: Ah, a new face is always a welcome sight in our village! I’m Evanora, the medicine woman, and I’m here to help you with any herbal needs or simply to share some words of wisdom. Do you have any questions about our lovely island of Telmaron, or perhaps need assistance settling in?

name: Evanora, the medicine woman
text: Greetings and welcome to our quaint corner of the world! I'm Evanora, the medicine woman. I tend to the health and well-being of our villagers. Should you need a remedy crafted from the enchanted herbs of Telmaron or wish for a bit of wisdom to guide your steps, I'm here for you. How can I assist you today?

name: Evanora, the medicine woman
text: Welcome, fresh-faced traveler, to our village! I'm Evanora, and it seems the winds have whispered your arrival to me many times. Whether you seek healing, advice, or simply a listening ear, my door is always open to you. Is there anything I can do to make your transition here smoother?
